columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.description: Coverage ID for Bed Days at the Coverage (CVG) Level

columns.description: Bed Days Coverage Level Total Authorized Days

columns.description: Coverage Level Bed Days Next Review Date

columns.description: Earliest Start Date for Coverage Level Bed Days

columns.name: CVG_LATEST_DATE
columns.description: Coverage Level Latest Bed Days End Date
